ZTEsoft to Unveil ZSmart Digital CRM for New Lifestyle

ZSmart Digital CRM is a cloud-based, digital ecosystem driven next-gen telecom solution that enables CSPs (Communication Service Providers) to facilitate the digital life for customers and satisfy them by providing sophisticated services and seamless experience.
